General.Name: Zhongnongfa Seed Industry Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhongnongfa Seed Industry Group Co., Ltd. engages in the seed and agrochemical businesses in China. It offers wheat, rice, corn, cotton, and rape seeds; pesticides and fertilizers; and agricultural services. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

3.Name: Mr. Haitao  Hu
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
